#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int ff=0;
        if(n%7==0)
        {
            ff++;
            n=n/7;
            if(n%7==0)
            {
                ff++;
                n=n/7;
                if(n%7==0)
                {
                    ff++;
                    n=n/7;
                }
            }
        }
        if(ff==2)
            cout<<"YES\n";
        else
            cout<<"NO\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
